text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips It's a shame that society still has this problem and people need to deal with it. I was appalled when I discovered that comment on our talk's YT page. I mean, who says those kinds of things? Good that you're speaking out about it, but not good that you have to speak out about it.

author.name: Eric Deandrea (@edeandrea@mastodon.social)
author.description: Sr. Principal Developer Advocate @RedHat, contributor to open source projects, speaker, author, ice hockey lover, & hold a black belt in martial arts.
